data.title: 2024 WayV CONCERT [ON THE Way] IN HONG KONG
data.description:
Date & Time 時間: 2025/01/04 (SAT) 7:30PM

Venue 地點: AsiaWorld-Expo, Hall 8 & 10


WayZenNi WEVERSE Pre-sale WayZenNi WEVERSE會員優先訂票

2024/10/23 (WED) 10:00 – 23:59 Local time


General Sale 公開售票

2024/10/24 (THUR) 10:00 Local time



Ticket Price 門票價格 （未包含服務費）

-VVIP HKD$1,988

*SOUND CHECK

-VIP HKD$1,888

*隨機電腦抽取30名幸運粉絲獲得限量簽名海報

Random Lucky draw of 30 signed poster winners

-PS1 HKD$1,488

*隨機電腦抽取10名幸運粉絲獲得限量簽名拍立得

Random Lucky draw of 10 signed polaroid winners

-PS2 HKD$1,088

-PS3 HKD$888



Ticket Delivery 實體門票寄送

Fantopia physical tickets will be delivered starting on November 18(th) 2024. Please enter the correct information (eg. address & phone number) when you purchase the tickets. You can track the status of ticket deliveries through "Fantopia- My Tickets". Ticket purchasers from outside Mainland, Hong Kong and Macau: Please pay attention to the subsequent ticket redemption notice.

*Fantopia訂購成功之實體門票將於2024年11月18日起陸續寄出，請您在購票時輸入準確地址電話等正確訊息，門票寄出後，您可透過“Fantopia-我的門票”關注門票寄送狀態。中國大陸港澳之外的購票者：請留意後續門票換領通知。


Physical Ticket Service Fee: 50 HKD per ticket, same price for offline pickup or delivery.

實體門票服務費：50 HKD 每張門票，寄送與綫下取票同價


*Each ticket is assigned a specific seat.

所有票價均為坐席(對號入座)。

*Grandstand seats with built on risers

本節目設有升高看台。

*Must complete ticketing website member registration before proceeding any ticket purchase.

無論是會員預售還是公開發售，都請記得預先登記成為各票務網站會員才可購票

*Registration does not guarantee you a ticket. Your WayZenNi WEVERSE number will be your presale promo code

登記會員並不保證成功購票。您的WayZenNi WEVERSE會員編號即為您的預購碼(例: WW123456789)

*Purchase limit is 1 ticket for WayZenNi WEVERSE pre-sale and 4 tickets per show (including the 1 ticket purchased during the pre-sale) per transaction for general sale. If more than 1 ticket are purchased with the same membership ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.

會員預購每筆ID限購一張票券，公開售票每人每交易限購四張票券(含一張會員預購票券)。若經核對發現同一會員ID購票數超過一張，主辦單位有權取消該票券交易。

*Age limit: 3 years or above. One person per ticket regardless of age. A valid ticket is required for admission

年齡限制: 只限3歲或以上；每張門票只供一人進場。入場時必需持有有效門票。

*If a ticket is lost, damaged, defaced or stolen, the organizer and ticketing agency will not reissue or replace the ticket, and will not bear any responsibility. Please keep your ticket carefully.

演出門票如有遺失、損毀、塗污或被竊，主辦及售票機構概不補發或更換門票，亦不會承擔任何責任，敬請小心保管。

*Ticket holders must abide by the rules and regulations of AsiaWorld-Expo. Otherwise, may be denied entry to the venue without refund.

持票人必須遵守亞洲國際博覽館之條例及規則，否則可能會被拒進場並不獲退款。

*We do not offer returns or exchanges

售出門票不設退換

eventsEntity.entityAdress: RM 413,4/F LUCKY CTR 165-171WAN CHAI RD WAN CHAI HK
